azurerm_cosmosdb_mongo_database.description: Manages a Mongo Database within a Cosmos DB Account.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Cosmos DB Mongo Database. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Cosmos DB Mongo Database is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

account_name.description: The name of the Cosmos DB Mongo Database to create the table within. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

throughput.description: The throughput of the MongoDB collection (RU/s). Must be set in increments of `100`. The minimum value is `400`. This must be set upon database creation otherwise it cannot be updated without a manual terraform destroy-apply.

id.description: The ID of the Cosmos DB Mongo Database.

create.description: Used when creating the CosmosDB Mongo Database.

update.description: Used when updating the CosmosDB Mongo Database.

read.description: Used when retrieving the CosmosDB Mongo Database.

delete.description: Used when deleting the CosmosDB Mongo Database.
